page.title: 15BUILDINGS
page.content: { Buildings}as Architectural features. -------------------------------------- Bassingham,Thurlby and Haddington contain some fine examples of{architecture.}These{buildings}date from the eighteenth century to the present day.The orange red colours of the buildings blend tastefully with the{landscape. }Older buildings were built with the bricks and pantiles made at the local brickworks. Since 1851 imported,factory made{bricks}have been used. Various types of brick bonding are to be found in the area. These include Flemish, English, English Cross Bond, Stretcher Bond and Header Bond.
